# vImage.EdgeMode.extend

**Case**

An edge mode that extends the edges of the image infinitely.

## Declaration

```swift
case extend
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **vImage.EdgeMode.copyInPlace**: An edge mode that copies the value of the edge pixel in the source to the destination.
- **vImage.EdgeMode.fill(backgroundColor:)**: An edge mode that uses the background color for missing pixels.
- **vImage.EdgeMode.truncateKernel**: An edge mode that uses only the part of the kernel that overlaps the image.
